title: BRIEF-Financial Institutions To Reduce Board Size To 11 Members
text:
March 28, 2018 / 5:20 PM / in 15 minutes BRIEF-Financial Institutions To Reduce Board Size To 11 Members Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 28 (Reuters) - Financial Institutions Inc: 
* FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS SAYS BOARD HAS DETERMINED IT IS IN COâ€™S BEST INTEREST TO REDUCE SIZE OF BOARD FROM 12 TO 11 MEMBERS - SEC FILING 
* FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS-ON MARCH 27, ERLAND E. KAILBOURNE NOTIFIED HIS INTENTION TO NOT STAND FOR RE-ELECTION AS DIRECTOR WHEN HIS CURRENT TERM EXPIRES Source text: [ bit.ly/2IdyNV7 ] Further company coverage:
